location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 24 April and transmitting a letter from J. Adam, Secretary to the Government at Fort William to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, dated 17 June 1814, discouraging any future visits made by Persians to Hyderabad, like that of Meerza Sadig [Mirza Sadiq] and Mahomed Sadig [Mahomed Sadiq] to the Court of Hyderabad.
